short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Downloader - download any video from any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Downloader is a revolutionary Chrome extension for users looking to save videos from any website to their hard disk. Supporting all popular video formats, the extension allows for swift, uninterrupted downloads at unmatched speeds and up to 8K resolutions. Being completely free, it widens its reach to Windows, Mac OS and Linux systems. There are a lot websites where Video Downloader is currently disabled due to Chrome store restrictions (such as Youtube, vimeo and others).
